data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Liu, Xiao-Yan, Guo, Zhao-Liang, Yu, Hui (2006): Caridina xiangnanensis, a new freshwater atyid shrimp (Crustacea, Decapoda, Atyidae) from Hunan Province, China. Zootaxa 1153: 43-49, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.172198
